# AVCaptionRubyAlignment.distributeSpaceAround

**Case**

An alignment with the ruby text so the spaces around each ruby text character are equal.

## Declaration

```swift
case distributeSpaceAround
```

## Text alignments

- **AVCaptionRubyAlignment.start**: An alignment with the ruby base and text at the left edge of horizontal text in a left-to-right inline progression, or at top of the vertical text in a top-to-bottom inline progression.
- **AVCaptionRubyAlignment.center**: An alignment with the ruby text at the center of ruby base.
- **AVCaptionRubyAlignment.distributeSpaceBetween**: An alignment with the ruby text so the spaces between the ruby text characters are equal.
